changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION ruleform.propagate_relationship_network_deductions() RETURNS trigger AS 'com.hellblazer.CoRE.meta.models.RelationshipModelImpl.propagate_deductions' LANGUAGE javaU VOLATILE COST 100; ALTER FUNCTION ruleform.propagate_relationship_network_deductions() OWNER TO core;
